{-# LINE 19 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}

module System.Posix.Signals.Exts (
  module System.Posix.Signals


{-# LINE 26 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}

{-# LINE 27 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}
  , windowChange, sigWINCH

{-# LINE 29 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}

  ) where

import Foreign.C
import System.Posix.Signals


{-# LINE 43 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}

{-# LINE 46 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}

{-# LINE 47 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}
foreign import ccall unsafe "__hsunix_SIGWINCH"   sigWINCH   :: CInt

{-# LINE 49 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}

{-# LINE 50 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}


{-# LINE 55 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}


{-# LINE 57 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}
windowChange :: Signal
windowChange = sigWINCH

{-# LINE 60 "libraries/unix/System/Posix/Signals/Exts.hsc" #-}
